08 APRIL 2019

Amruta Inc Invited to Speak at GW Data 2019

ðŸ‘‹ Welcome fellow

The George Washington University School of Business organized GW Data on December 7, 2019. Speakers from Amazon, Amruta Inc, Bloomberg, Booz Allen Hamilton, Disney, Gartner, Hilton, IBM, Niyamit, and Tableau addressed the graduate and undergraduate students on the aspects of data driven insights, big data, and big changes. Amruta Incâ€™s CEO, Dr. Beju Rao, PhD, spoke about their Explainable AI and Data Science IT platform and services. He discussed how big data and cloud computing help improve strategic outcomes across multiple business functions, using the platform. He talked about Risk, Compliance, Revenue, Profitability, Safety, and Reputation use cases and AI/Data Science pipelines implemented by customizing the platform across industries.
